title: Teen crashes into Lambo Urus SUV, Hyundai jabs VW with cheeky ad - Top motoring stories of the day
text:
Wheels24 correspondent Charlen Raymond reviewed the new Mazda 3. Read his thoughts and review on the car.

A cool seatbelt made specifically to protect pregnant women during the unfortunate event of a car crash, will save a newborn baby's life.

In case you missed it

A teenager is in hot water with law enforcement in Australia after he crashed a stolen Subaru Forester into a R3.5-million Lamborghini Urus.

READ | So much trouble! Teen steals a Subaru then crashes into a R3.5-million Lamborghini Urus SUV

Hyundai takes a subtle dig at Volkswagen's T-Cross with a cheeky billboard advert, promoting its Venue SUV to be launched in the coming months.

Another offering from Mazda, the CX-30, will be making its way to our shores next year. Take a look at what to expect from the compact SUV.

Click on the links below to read the full article:
description: Hyundai has poked Volkswagen in the sides with a cheeky jibe at the T-Cross for its new model launching later this year, and a teen Down Under steals a car, crashes a police Toyota Hilux, and then rams into a Lamborghini SUV.
